titles.title: Safe Bridges Investment Act of 2015
To amend title 23, United States Code, to include bridges on the National Highway Performance Program.
Safe Bridges Investment Act of 2015

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Highways and Transit.

bill.summary:
Safe Bridges Investment Act of 2015
This bill includes as a project eligible for funds apportioned to a state to carry out the National Highway Performance Program the construction, reconstruction, resurfacing, restoration, rehabilitation, and preservation of, or operational improvements for, a bridge not on the National Highway System if such bridge is on the Federal-aid Highway System.
